fields.value:
backup friendica if nerdica goes down: https://venera.social/profile/darth_tiktaalik

These sites I'm active on, but aren't really built around following individual users:

topic/community oriented social networks:

http://lemmy.ml (fully floss, federates well with friendica if you don't like the reddit style socials but still want to interact with it's community)
https://reddit.com

wikis:

https://libregamewiki.org (a community maintained resource on fully free as in freedom games)
